price: Lẹ́yìn náà, wọ́n yóò dá wọn padà sí ọ̀dọ̀ Allāhu Olúwa wọn Òdodo. Kíyè sí i, tiRẹ̀ ni ìdájọ́. Ó sì yára jùlọ nínú àwọn olùṣírò.¹
arabic: ثُمَّ رُدُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَوۡلَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ أَلَا لَهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ وَهُوَ أَسۡرَعُ ٱلۡحَٰسِبِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma ruddū ilā al-lahi mawlāhumu al-ḥaqi alā lahu al-ḥuk'mu wahuwa asraʿu al-ḥāsibīna
